about_the_game:
Yomaia: The Definitive Survival Experience




Yomaia is a MMO Survival Horror game developed by BEWARE LLC where players can immerse themselves in the wild and challenging world of Zone C, a huge and constantly changing island with its own mind that will make everyday a real challenge. As a player, you'll have the option to choose between prowling the island like a carnivore or herbivore dinosaur or moving through the dangerous forests like a human.

Living, eating, raising, forming your own group or surviving the weather that hit the map will be the least of your worries in a world where dark mysteries hide in every corner and more terrifying things than a dinosaur move unseen in the depths of the island.

Whether you like to admire the beautiful landscapes, demonstrate your survival skills, hunt other players or feel the terrible anguish of the enclosed spaces in the BioGenesis Corporation Labs, this game will undoubtedly be your best experience in the survival horror genre. Explore the vast and dense forests or the open grasslands plains, crawl treacherous mountains and swim through dirty swamps where other players lurk for you. And for those brave souls that like to face the danger, access to the hidden labs that hold experiments that even dinosaurs are afraid of.

Enjoy the incredible potential of Unreal Engine 5 in the premise of pitting man against dinosaurs in a new and reinvented way that will bring an unparalleled immersion to the player. A game that brings together the best of both worlds: survival and horror, man and beast, and with new and revolutionary game mechanics that will bring a renewal to the survival & sandbox genre and gameplay.

A Primal MMO Experience




Unleash your primal instinct. When coming to Yomaia, you will be able to play as more than 60 unique creatures, from little and cute herbivores like Dryosaurus, royal tyrants such as Spinosaurus or Tyrannosaurus, flying beasts as Pteranodon or sea nightmares like the Mosasaurus. As a dinosaur, you'll be the epitome of the food chain. Use your natural abilities and senses to stay off the menu and grow into a stronger and more capable creature. But don't be cocky, because humans would be around with their own methods capable of standing still against many of the animals that roam the island.

Engage with a living and ancient ecosystem as you become either predator or prey on a online interaction between more than 300 players per server, all of them hungry and dangerous as you. Form packs and herds, defend your offspring, hunt and claim territory, or craft your own weapons and vehicles to survive as a human in a land full of dark secrets more dangerous than any dinosaur. Form your own team and investigate the bowels of the island and discover the terrible truth!

Survival-Horror Revolution




Yomaia's core is based on a Survival-Horror style heavily influenced by the old games like Dino Crisis and the extensive action and survival gameplay from games like Evolve. As a survival you will experience a tense and difficult gameplay where you need to grow or die young. The Dinosaurs will need to progress through several life stages, from small and vulnerable beings to the titans that they were supposed to be. Using your special abilities and the awareness of the weather changes will be imperative for you to survive on Yomaia, unlocking (and evolving) on the process new abilities that will give you an unique gameplay each time. As a human the mechanic will be similar, with a more rpg component (depending on what kind of human you choose) where you will need to craft your own items to survive and even access to some unique places.



As for the game modes within Yomaia, you can enjoy the classic Survival Mode if what you like is to experience a semi-realistic experience in a paleo environment, growing your dinosaur and developing its abilities until it reaches maturity and conquers the island. However, we also have other modalities that will allow the player to enjoy the running riot in a legendary Free For All (FFA) or the old Sandbox concept, experiencing every possible dinosaur and/or human in its different phases and stages.

All this options (and more that will come in the future, like "Capture the Egg") will make from our game the definitive dinosaur game where everyone can enjoy and roam around the map as they desire.

Riddles on the Darkness




As a key factor of Yomaia narrative, a huge part of the history is all spreaded around the world map and the environment, encouraging the cooperation among players to unveil the truth about the island and BioGenesis Corporation secrets. Altogether with that, the community will also have the chance to discover new pieces of history and what happened on the island through Yomaia's Official Media Sources and a lot more!

What are those "beeping" sounds that fill the air? What you can read from the old computers in the labs? What does "CODE BRUTICUS IMPERATOR" mean? All that and more awaits to you on Yomaia.

name: Yomaia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280X series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game needs a dedicated graphics card to run. Integrated graphics cards will not work.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game needs a dedicated graphics card to run. Integrated graphics cards will not work.

short_description: Experience the definitive survival experience on a open world full of dangers as you attempt to stay alive on an unforgiving land inhabited by dinosaurs and mutants! Be the Hunter. Be the Survivor. Be the Prey.
